alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Owyhee County through 200 PM MDT... At 118 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Toy Pass, or 39 miles south of Nampa, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Toy Pass around 200 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley
